meanings.sent1: The little puppy was the shakiest during the thunderstorm.
meanings.sent2: Her hands were the shakiest when she was nervous.
meanings.sent3: The shakiest leaf on the tree danced in the wind.
meanings.sent4: The shakiest voice in the choir added a unique vibrato.
meanings.sent5: The shakiest bridge creaked under the weight of the heavy truck.

meanings.sent1: The weather forecast was the shakiest this week.
meanings.sent2: He made the shakiest promises that he couldn't keep.
meanings.sent3: The shakiest excuse for being late was blaming the traffic on Mars.
meanings.sent4: Her trust in him was as shakiest as a house of cards.
meanings.sent5: The shakiest ground for building a house turned out to be quicksand.

meanings.sent1: The shakiest chair in the room collapsed under his weight.
meanings.sent2: The shakiest ladder wobbled dangerously as he climbed.
meanings.sent3: The shakiest foundation for a house was built on a bed of marbles.
meanings.sent4: His grip on the shakiest rope slipped, causing him to fall.
meanings.sent5: The shakiest branch on the tree snapped under the weight of the squirrel.
